entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:37 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
